\s1\ql \li0\ri0\keepn\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\outlinelevel0\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\ul\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
CORPORATE SAFETY COMMITMENTS
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par Lamb-Weston, Inc. has potato processing plants located in Washington, Oregon, Idaho, and Minnesota. }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\cf1\insrsid3896864 
Lamb-Weston is committed to providing its employees and the surrounding community with a safe and healthy environment.  The Risk Management Program is an integral part of our strong commitment to \'93sustainable development,\'94
 which means development that meets the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.  Sustainable Develo
pment requi

3\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \ul\insrsid3896864 
FIVE-YEAR ACCIDENT HISTORY}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
\par 
\par There have been no accidental releases at the }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Connell}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 , Washington}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864  Facilit
y in the last five years from covered processes that resulted in deaths, injuries, or significant property damage on site, or known offsite deaths, injuries, evacuations, sheltering in place}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \cf6\insrsid3896864 , }{
\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \cf1\insrsid3896864 property damage, or environmental damage.
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \ul\insrsid3896864 EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM  
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085 
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 The }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Connell}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 
, Washington facility has an emergency action plan which has been coordinated (reviewed) with }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Franklin County Emergency Management and Franklin County local emergency planning committee}{
\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 .}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085  }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085 
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 The plan applies to all Lamb-Weston employees, 
visitors, and support service contractors performing tasks and activities as part of ongoing operations.  The purpose of the plan is to establish policies and procedures for protecting the health and safety of employees, contractors, and visitors,

res reductions in the generation of wastes and pollutants, protection of clean air and clean water, sustainable protection of the land, and the wise use of energy.  It requires employee commitment, strategic thinking, innovation, the involvemen
t of our suppliers, new technology and enhanced production processes.  
\par 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s2\ql \li0\ri0\keepn\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\outlinelevel1\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\ul\cf1\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 
\insrsid3896864 DESCRIPTION OF FACILITY AND REGULATED SUBSTANCES}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \ulnone\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s15\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 
\insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 The }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Connell}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 , Washington processing facility produces various potato products such as }{
\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 french fries }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 and formed potato products.  The pla
nt site consists of a main processing plant, raw potato storage buildings, boiler/refrigeration facility, primary and secondary water treatment facility, and refrigerated cold storage.  Activities are conducted at this site during all months of the year.

\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025

\ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s15\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
The potato processing cycle includes a wide array of steps.  The plant purchases the majority of its potatoes from local growers.  Since potatoes have a single growing season, they must be held under controlled storage conditions.  Prior to processing, th
e potatoes are separated by size and processing specifications.  The inspected, washed, peeled, and hand-trimmed potatoes are cut, blanched and fried.  The final products are frozen, packaged and prepared for shipping.
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s1\ql \li0\ri0\keepn\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\outlinelevel0\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\ul\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 
\insrsid3896864 ACCIDENTAL RELEASE PREVENTION PROGRAM}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \ulnone\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par Lamb-Weston\rquote 
s accident prevention/loss control systems and policies involve a unified approach that integrates technologies, procedures, and best-management practices.  The OSHA-PSM and the EPA-RMP plans work together to assure that potential on-site haz
ards and off-site conse

quences are identified and controlled to the best of our ability, and that the processes are meeting health and safety objectives.
\par 
\par The RMP Prevention Program is comprised of the 13 elements of OSHA\rquote s PSM program: }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\cf1\insrsid3896864 Employee Participat
ion, Process Safety Information, Process Hazard Analysis, Management of Change, Pre-Startup Safety Review, Operating Procedures, Hot Work Permits, Employee Training, Incident Investigation, Mechanical Integrity, Emergency Planning & Response, Contractor S
afety, and Audits.  }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s15\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
Employee participation brought together people that knew and understood the system, from practical experience as well as their technical knowledge, to develop the Plan.  Process safety information is a collection of data that allows us
 to identify and understand the hazards posed by our inventory}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\cf1\insrsid3896864 
.  Representatives from our skilled work force and Lamb-Weston management, who understood the process being analyzed including the engineering behind the covered process, conducted the process h
azard analysis.  This analysis identifies potential process failures that could result in an uncontrolled release of ammonia.   
\par 
\par In order to safely manage changes that need to be made to the processes containing ammonia, a system of checks and balances ha
s been established.  This system will e

and to 
comply with all applicable federal and state regulations.  
\par Training of employees and contractors includes providing a copy of the plan upon initial employment at Lamb-Weston and reviewing it for their specific assignment, annual refresher training for curr
ent employees, and review for all whenever the plan is changed.  In addition, plant evacuation drills are conducted on a regular basis. 
\par 
\par The plan is comprehensive enough to deal with all types of emergencies specific to the Lamb-Weston }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Connell}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 , Washington}{
\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864  facility and defines the following:
\par 
\par {\pntext\pard\plain\ltrpar \s15 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20 \ltrch\fcs0 \f3\insrsid3896864 \loch\af3\dbch\af0\hich\f3 \'b7\tab}}\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault{\*\pn \pnlvlblt\ilvl0\ls1\pnrnot0\pnf3\pnstart1\pnindent360\pnhang 
{\pntxtb \'b7}}\nooverflow\faroman\ls1\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid1073304 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 How to conduct activities in a manner that protects the safety of employees, the public, and the environment
\par }\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault{\*\pn \pnlvlcont\ilvl12\ls0\pnrnot0\pndec }\nooverflow\faroman\ilvl12\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid1073304 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
\par {\pntext\pard\plain\ltrpar \s15 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20 \ltrch\fcs0 \f3\insrsid3896864 \loch\af3\dbch\af0\hich\f3 \'b7\tab}}\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \fi-360\li720\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault{\*\pn \pnlvlblt\ilvl0\ls1\pnrnot0\pnf3\pnstart1\pnindent360\pnhang 
{\pntxtb \'b7}}\nooverflow\faroman\ls1\rin0\lin720\itap0\pararsid1073304 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 Preferred means for reporting fires, hazardous materials incidents, medical, and any other emergencies
\par }\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\wrapde

valuate safety prior to the work being done, and provide a solid review of the system to assure that once started, it will run as designed}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \i\f39\fs24\cf1\insrsid3896864 .}{\rtlch\fcs1 
\af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\cf1\insrsid3896864   Standard operating procedures are in place for each operating phase and are 
readily accessible to those workers who operate or maintain the process.  In addition, a policy and procedure are used to assure that proper safety precautions are taken for all personnel performing Hot Work.  The integrity of the refrigeration system equ
ipment is maintained according to recognized and generally accepted good engineering practices and according to a well-documented preventive maintenance program.
\par 
\par An extensive training program is in place for those employees and contractors involved in work
ing on or around the process and covers operating procedures, health and safety hazards, emergency operations, and safe work practices.  The facility also has a training program for all employees and contractors regarding the hazards of the chemical and s
afe work practices to be used.  Part of this training includes monthly safety meetings as well as drills on spill response and plant evacuation.  
\par 
\par Any incidents related to the ammonia refrigeration systems are promptly investigated even though the rule onl
y requires investigation of those incidents, which resulted in, or could reasonably have resulted in, a catastrophic release.  All incidents are analyzed, resolved, and findings shared with affected employees.  In order to assure compliance with all eleme
nts of the prevention program, an audit is conducted every three years including a report of the findings and documentation of any deficiencies corrected.
\par 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\s15\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp103

\par }\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \li360\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault{\*\pn \pnlvlcont\ilvl12\ls0\pnrnot0\pndec }\nooverflow\faroman\ilvl12\rin0\lin360\itap0\pararsid1073304 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864

\par }\pard \ltrpar\s15\ql \li0\ri0\w

\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \ul\insrsid3896864 PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864 
\par }\pard\plain \ltrpar\ql \li0\ri0\widctlpar\wrapdefault\nooverflow\faroman\rin0\lin0\itap0 \rtlch\fcs1 \af0\afs20\alang1025 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs20\lang1033\langfe1033\cgrid\langnp1033\langfenp1033 {\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
\par The }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid13314085\charrsid13314085 Connell}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864\charrsid13314085 , Washington}{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \fs24\insrsid3896864 
 facility takes seriously its responsibility for the safety of its employees, neighbors, and community.  Central to this responsibility are our programs to prevent the release of chemicals to the environment.
  We will continue to implement these precautions and programs, to act as a responsible neighbor, and to maintain the goodwill of the community.
\par }{\rtlch\fcs1 \af0 \ltrch\fcs0 \insrsid3896864
